title: A Review of XAI Failures and Works on Its Influence on Security
content: The importance of XAI is undeniable in the current scenario and thus it's importance in considerable. Unfortunately, there are a couple of scenarios where the current XAI models fail. Additionally, attackers seek vulnerabilities in these models. This review paper is intended to cover some of the important scenarios where the existing XAI models may fail and some progresses made which shows their vulnerabilities and how to secure them.
